    • createOrder

      @RequestMapping(value="", method=POST) public orderModel createOrder(@RequestBody orderModel order)
      POST method '/orders' creating order with params body needs to look like : { "student": "21012", "date": "01012023", "price": 10, "state": 1 }
      Parameters:
      order - order to be posted
      Returns:
      the posted order

    • updateStatus

      @RequestMapping(value="/status", method=POST) public orderModel updateStatus(@RequestBody String status)
      update the status of an order body needs to look like : { "state": 1 }
      Parameters:
      status - new status of the order you want to update
      Returns:
      the updated order

    • readOrders

      @RequestMapping(value="", method=GET) public List<orderModel> readOrders()

      Returns:
      all the orders

    • readOrderById

      @RequestMapping(value="/{orderId}", method=GET) public Optional<orderModel> readOrderById(@PathVariable("orderId") Long id)
      return a specific order by its id
      Parameters:
      id - id of the order to be returned
      Returns:
      the order which has the provided id

    • updateOrders

      @RequestMapping(value="/{orderId}", method=PUT) public orderModel updateOrders(@PathVariable("orderId") Long id, @RequestBody orderModel orderDetails)
      update an order which already exists body needs to look like : { "orderId":1, "student":"1999", "date":"220307", "price":10, "state":1 }
      Parameters:
      id - id of the order to be updated
      orderDetails - new order data
      Returns:
      the updated order

      @RequestMapping(value="/{orderId}", method=DELETE) public void deleteOrder(@PathVariable("orderId") Long id)

      Parameters:
      id - id of the order to be deleted

    • readOrderByUserId

      @RequestMapping(value="/getOrderByUserId/{userId}", method=GET) public List<orderModel> readOrderByUserId(@PathVariable("userId") Long id)
      read a specific order by its user id
      Parameters:
      id - id of the user corresponding to the order to be returned
      Returns:
      the order which has the provided user id
